name: Bot-navigation-on-a-grid
body:
# Bot_navigation-on a grid . The robot will traverse on a N*N grid , starting from (0,0 ) . Initially the location of all destination is saved in program , the bot will reach these points by calculating the shortest path . If there is a obstacle in the path , it will plan a new path . After travelling all points , it will return back to origin . # HARDWARE CONTROLLING UNIT - AVR AtMega32 uC . For controlling motors a motor driver (L293D) is used . IR Sensor Array consisting of 8 IR Sensors . LED . # SOFTWARE AVR STUDIO Language - C # Additional Details Images of bot is in image directory
![My Unicorn](https://github.com/sk1210/Bot-navigation-on-a-Grid/Image/Lfr.jpg).
Sample Video Link on You tube - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_q7eleYf4SY
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
